question:
Consider the following:
  1. Constitution (106th Amendment) Bill, 2006
  2. Constitution (111th) Amendment Bill, 2009
The above two amendment bills are related to which among the following respectively?
explanation: Constitution (106th Amendment) Bill, 2006 was introduced in the Lok Sabha on 22nd May, 2006 for the purpose of empowering cooperatives through voluntary formation, autonomous functioning, democratic control and professional management. Bill could not be discussed in the Lok Sabha for passing. The Bill lapsed on dissolution of 14th Lok Sabha on 18.05.2009. It was decided to reintroduce the Bill for amendment to the Constitution. Accordingly, the Constitution (Hundred and Eleventh) Amendment Bill was introduced in the Lok Sabha on 30.09.2009.
